properties.entry: INSERT INTO USER_INFO A ( A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_NAME , A.EMAIL , A.AUTHORITY , A.COIN , A.DELETE_YN , A.HAVING_HOUSE_YN , A.FARM_EXP , A.HOUSE_PRICE , A.CONTINUE_YN ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )

SELECT A.USER_NO , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PWD , A.USER_NAME , A.EMAIL , A.AUTHORITY , A.COIN , A.DELETE_YN , A.HAVING_HOUSE_YN , A.FARM_EXP , HOUSE_PRICE , A.CONTINUE_YN FROM USER_INFO A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?
SELECT A.CONTINUE_YN FROM USER_INFO A WHERE A.USER_NO = ?

UPDATE ( SELECT * FROM FOOD F, RETAIN_FOOD RF , RECIPE R, USER_INFO UI, CROP C, SEED S, NEED_EXP NE, FARM_CROP FC , RETAIN_TOOL RT, TOOL T, HOUSE H, RETAIN_CROP RC WHERE F.FOOD_ID = RF.FOOD_ID AND RF.FOOD_ID = R.FOOD_ID AND RF.USER_NO = UI.USER_NO AND R.CROP_ID = C.CROP_ID AND C.CROP_ID = S.CROP_ID AND S.CROP_ID = NE.CROP_ID AND UI.USER_NO = FC.USER_NO AND UI.USER_NO = RT.USER_NO AND RT.TOOL_ID = T.TOOL_ID AND H.USER_NO = UI.USER_NO AND UI.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO ) SET UI.COIN = DEFAULT , UI.CONTINUE_YN = DEFAULT , S.SEED_AMOUNT = DEFAULT , FC.ACCUMULATE_EXP = DEFAULT , FC.CROP_STATUS = DEFAULT , RC.CROP_AMOUNT = DEFAULT , RF.FOOD_AMOUNT = DEFAULT WHERE UI.USER_NO = ?
